Pre-Game Insights: San Antonio Spurs and Portland Trail Blazers are set to face off in a Western Conference matchup.
The Spurs are favored by 5.5 points according to BETMGM Sportsbook.
San Antonio Spurs had a record of 22-60 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference play during the 2023-24 season.
Portland Trail Blazers had a record of 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
Key injuries for the Spurs include Devin Vassell (foot), Tre Jones (ankle), and Jeremy Sochan (thumb).
Key injuries for the Trail Blazers include Matisse Thybulle (knee) and Shaedon Sharpe (shoulder).
